content.p: We offer a range of both taught masters and PhD research courses. Research your passion supplemented by teaching from our experts. A masters is ideal preparation for a PhD or shorter research topics: Produce a significant piece of research with support and guidance from our academic staff. More about our research See our postgraduate research prospectus Discover campus life at the University of Nottingham with 360 degree images and videos on our virtual tour. Experience student life by exploring areas such as accommodation, student services, sport centres, libraries and more. Find out about the PhD funding available. View our student profiles
